column1: second_line_text_set_1_A0:"Вигляд твій із вежею порівняю фортеці"

column2: third_line_text_set_1_B0":"Щось зробити з амбре ось цим вічним."

column1: fourth_line_text_set_1_A0:"Потонути я хочу знову і знову."
fourth_line_text_set_1_B0:"От хоч в кухлі. Я зовсім п'янію."
# Lines from the Song of Roland:""
0002.blank_verse_line_1_A0:" King Marsilies he lay at Sarraguce
column2: 0002.blank_verse_line_1_B0":" Blancandrins was a pagan very wise

column1: 0002.blank_verse_line_2_B0:"  In vassalage he was a gallant knight
column2: 0002.blank_verse_line_2_C0":"  Full seven years hath sojourned in Spain

column1: 0002.blank_verse_line_3_A0:" There on a throne he sate

column3: 0002.blank_verse_line_3_D0":" His catapults have battered town and tow'r."

column1: 0002.blank_verse_line_4_B0:"  And thus he spoke: Do not yourself affright!"""
0002.blank_verse_line_4_C0:"  Now no fortress against him doth remain
column2: 0002.blank_verse_line_4_D0":"  Silver and gold and many a jeweled gown."

column1: # Lines from the Song of Roland for now:""
0003.line_3_C0:"[ROOT.GetCharacter.Custom('noun_specific_singular_two')|D] весь цей гірський край до моря зайняв

column2: штурмом взяв усі міста та замки
column3: 0003.line_4_D0":"[ROOT.GetCharacter.Custom('noun_abstract_singular_two')|D]  Silver and gold and many a jeweled gown."
